butterfree.core.extract.pre_processing.filter_transform module¶

Module where filter DataFrames coming from readers.

butterfree.core.extract.pre_processing.filter_transform.filter(dataframe: pyspark.sql.dataframe.DataFrame, condition)¶

Filters DataFrame’s rows using the given condition and value.

Parameters

  • dataframe – Spark DataFrame.

  • condition – SQL expression with column, operation and value to filter the dataframe.

Returns

Filtered dataframe
